mainEntity.name: How are IIT Delhi placements compared with other top IITs?

acceptedAnswer.text: The below-mentioned comparison table showcases IIT Delhi placement 2023 statistics in comparison to other top IITs such as IIT Bombay, IIT Kanpur and IIT Madras: IIT Name Highest Package (2023) Average Package (2023) Number of Offers (2023) IIT Delhi INR 2.5 crore per annum INR 17.60 LPA 1,300 IIT Madras INR 1.31 crore per annum INR 17.00 LPA (median package) 1,612 IIT Bombay INR 3.67 crore per annum INR 21.82 LPA 1,898 IIT Kanpur INR 1.9 crore per annum INR 22.07 LPA 1,200 Note: IIT Delhi and IIT Kanpur average package data are not released. Hence, basis NIRF report 2023, the median package offered during IIT Delhi and IIT Kanpur BTech placements 2022 is shown above.

mainEntity.name: How many companies visit the campus during IIT Delhi placements?

acceptedAnswer.text: A total of 1,200 offers were made and 1,150 students were placed during the Phase 1 of IIT Delhi placements 2025. Further, more than 50 international offers were made during IIT Delhi Phase 1 placements 2024-25. mainEntity.name: How many offers were received during IIT Delhi placements?

acceptedAnswer.text: At end of IIT Delhi Phase 1 placements 2024-25, a total of 1,200 offers were made and 1,150 students were placed. In addition, more than 50 international offers were made during IIT Delhi Phase 1 placements 2024-25. International offers came from more than 15 organisations across multiple global regions including Netherlands, Japan, UAE, South Korea, Taiwan, United States and United Kingdom. The success rate of campus placements at IIT Delhi over the past three years is presented below: Particulars Placement Statistics (2023) Placement Statistics (2024) Placement Statistics (2025) Total offers 1300 1050 1200 Students placed 1150 1000 1150 International offers 30 50 50+

mainEntity.name: Where are IIT Delhi alumni working?

acceptedAnswer.text: According to data gathered from unofficial sources, IIT Delhi alumni are working in leading companies such as Google, Microsoft and Amazon. The sector-wise IIT Delhi alumni placement statistics are presented below: Note: The above-mentioned alumni data is gathered from unofficial sources and hence may vary.

mainEntity.name: What are some fascinating placement stories from IIT Delhi?

acceptedAnswer.text: According to unofficial sources, an interesting placement story revolves around a campus-interview where the interviewer observes “Chess as a hobby” in the resume of the student. The interviewer asks the student to play a virtual game of Chess with him by mentally shuffling the pieces. Subsequently, the interviewer, knowingly, makes a wrong move by moving the Queen, and interestingly, the student was quick to pounce on this and correct the interviewer, which landed the student the job.

mainEntity.name: What is the sector-wise employment percentage record during IIT Delhi placements?

acceptedAnswer.text: Core (Technical) sector emerged as the top recruiting sector that placed 20.7% of the total students. mainEntity.name: How good are the BTech placements at IIT Delhi?

acceptedAnswer.text: A total of 1,200 offers were made and 1,150 students were placed during the Phase 1 of IIT Delhi placements 2025. Further, more than 50 international offers were made during IIT Delhi Phase 1 placements 2024-25. According to Engineering NIRF report 2024, the median package offered during BTech placements 2023, 2022 and 2021 stood at INR 20 LPA, INR 20.5 LPA and INR 17.6 LPA, respectively. According to unofficial sources, the placement rate recorded during IIT Delhi BTech placements 2023 was 90.01%.

mainEntity.name: How are IIT Delhi M.Tech Placements?

acceptedAnswer.text: A total of 1,200 offers were made and 1,150 students were placed during the Phase 1 of IIT Delhi placements 2025. Further, more than 50 international offers were made during IIT Delhi Phase 1 placements 2024-25. As per NIRF report 2024, the median package offered during MTech placements 2023 stood at INR 14 LPA. Further, 308 students were placed and 112 students were selected for higher studies out of total 827 students during MTech placements 2023. Earlier, the median package offered during MTech placements 2022 and 2021 stood at INR 12.5 LPA and INR 15 LPA, respectively. As per NIRF report 2024, the key highlights of IIT Delhi M.Tech placements over the past three years are presented below: Particulars MTech Placement Statistics (2021) MTech Placement Statistics (2022) MTech Placement Statistics (2023) Median package INR 15 LPA INR 12.5 LPA INR 14 LPA Total students 867 813 827 Students placed 379 322 308 Selected for higher studies 240 159 112

mainEntity.name: What is the highest package offered during IIT Delhi M.Tech placements?

acceptedAnswer.text: IIT Delhi have a policy of not disclosing higher salary packages offered during placement drives. However, according to a press release released earlier, more than 50 students were offered salary package above INR 1 Crore per Annum during placements 2023.

mainEntity.name: What is the median package offered during IIT Delhi M.Tech placements?

acceptedAnswer.text: According to Engineering NIRF report 2024, the median package offered during IIT Delhi M.Tech placements over the past three years is presented below: Course Median Package (2021) Median Package (2022) Median Package (2023) MTech INR 15 LPA INR 12.5 LPA INR 14 LPA

acceptedAnswer.text: At end of IIT Delhi Phase 1 placements 2024-25, a total of 1,200 offers were made and 1,150 students were placed.
